EmailTemplate.name: Northam_Event_Defining_Data_Q115.Invite - Strata/Hadoop
EmailTemplate.subject: A New Approach to Big Data at Strata + Hadoop World
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DEFINING DATA IN THE CLOUD ERA A Pivotal Strategy Update HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Strata + Hadoop World <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ca-2015> is fast approaching. If you're planning to attend, be sure to visit us at booth #721 and get your most challenging questions answered by Pivotal experts. Meet members of our data science team and see Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite> in action.
While you are in town for Strata, we would like to invite you to our San Francisco office for an exclusive in-person strategy update on Tuesday, February 17th. Lunch will be provided and you will have an opportunity to tour our Pivotal office and see agile development in action. We hope you can be there for the groundbreaking data event! RSVP >>
Can't attend in person? Register for the live streaming event <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data?utm_source=Pivotal-Email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=New-Approach-to-Big-Data-in-the-Cloud>.
Regards, The Pivotal Team
